extension.name: Booking form in content mambot
extension.author: Vince Wooll
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) 2012 Vince Wooll All rights reserved.
extension.description: Booking form in article mambot. Use this bot to show the booking form of a specific property in the content of an article. In the article put {bot_jomres_bookingform N} where N is the property uid of the property.
